name: Plants Vs Ghouls
body:
## 1.0.0 Alpha 11
- Slot changes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 10
- Added cooldowns to Plants!
- Minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 9
- Added a new type of spiked Ghoul!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 8
- Added another type of faster and stroger Ghoul!
- Ghouls have random skins.
- More optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 7
- More Ghouls!
- Some optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 6
- Ghoul animation fixes.
- Plants have random sizes. (+15% max)
- You can see which Plant the the Ghouls are eating!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 5
- Ghouls can eat plants now!

## 1.0.0 Alpha 4
- Plant degree fix.
- Some other minor fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 3
- Minor fixes, optimisations.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 2
- Animation fixes.

## 1.0.0 Alpha 1
- First release.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
